title: Making Ten
activityDescription: Students Subitize groups of a dots as either greater than or less than ten.
coreSkillDescription: "The Blues Always Make Ten" Ask students "Is it more than ten or less than ten?". Students job is to identify this relationship and write the equation Ex: 10-4, 10+2...
standardDescription: Understand the relationship between numbers and quantities; connect counting to cardinality.
